PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-14612003-09-30,  ,  LAB,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisAppointment of WARREN EDMONDSON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; and orders that WARREN EDMONDSON be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective January 1, 2004.
AttachmentsAttachment
